\\/D:\\/repos\\/stride-translations\\/pt: Scenes and entities are arranged in a hierarchy, with the <g1>root scene<\/g1> at the top.
As cenas e entidades são organizadas em uma hierarquia, com a cena <g1>root<\/g1> no topo.
Scenes and entities are arranged in a hierarchy, with the <g1>root scene<\/g1> at the top.
This hierarchy is displayed in the <g2>Entity Tree<\/g2> in the Scene Editor on the left.
Esta hierarquia é exibida no <g2>Entity Tree<\/g2> no Editor de cenas à esquerda.
This hierarchy is displayed in the <g2>Entity Tree<\/g2> in the Scene Editor on the left.
The root scene contains all the scenes and entities in your game.
A cena raiz contém todas as cenas e entidades em seu jogo.
The root scene contains all the scenes and entities in your game.
It should contain common entities that the other scenes and entities use, such as game logic scripts.
Deve conter entidades comuns que as outras cenas e entidades usam, como scripts de lógica do jogo.
It should contain common entities that the other scenes and entities use, such as game logic scripts.
Scenes are kept in different folders.
As cenas são mantidas em pastas diferentes.
Scenes are kept in different folders.
This means that different people can work on them without overwriting each other's work.
Isso significa que pessoas diferentes podem trabalhar nelas sem sobrescrever o trabalho um do outro.
This means that different people can work on them without overwriting each other's work.
When scenes load at runtime, their <g1>child scenes aren't automatically loaded too<\/g1>.
Quando as cenas são carregadas no tempo de execução, suas cenas de <g1>child não são carregadas automaticamente demais<\/g1>.
When scenes load at runtime, their <g1>child scenes aren't automatically loaded too<\/g1>.
You have to load child scenes in code.
Você tem que carregar cenas de crianças em código.
You have to load child scenes in code.
Para obter mais informações, consulte as cenas <g2>Load<\/g2>.
Definir cenas de pais e filhos
The relationship between parent and child scenes is set on the child, not the parent.
A relação entre os pais e as cenas infantis é definida na criança, não no pai.
The relationship between parent and child scenes is set on the child, not the parent.
In other words, child scenes know about their parent scenes, but parent scenes don't know about their child scenes.
Em outras palavras, as cenas infantis sabem sobre suas cenas parentais, mas as cenas parentais não sabem sobre suas cenas infantis.
In other words, child scenes know about their parent scenes, but parent scenes don't know about their child scenes.
There are several ways to make a scene a child of another scene:
Há várias maneiras de fazer uma cena uma criança de outra cena:
There are several ways to make a scene a child of another scene:
In the Scene Editor <g1>Entity Tree<\/g1> (left by default), drag the scene onto the scene you want to make its parent.
No Editor de cena <g1>Entity Tree<\/g1> (esquerda por padrão), arraste a cena para a cena que você quer fazer seu pai.
In the Scene Editor <g1>Entity Tree<\/g1> (left by default), drag the scene onto the scene you want to make its parent.
Drag the scene from the <g1>Asset View<\/g1> (bottom by default) onto the scene you want to make its parent in the <g2>Entity Tree<\/g2>.
Arraste a cena do <g1>Asset View<\/g1> (bottom by default) para a cena que você deseja fazer seu pai no <g2>Entity Tree<\/g2>.
Drag the scene from the <g1>Asset View<\/g1> (bottom by default) onto the scene you want to make its parent in the <g2>Entity Tree<\/g2>.
In the scene <g1>Property Grid<\/g1> (on the right by default), next to <g2>Parent<\/g2>, specify the scene you want to be the scene's parent.
Na cena <g1>Property Grid<\/g1> (à direita por padrão), ao lado de <g2>Parent<\/g2>, especifique a cena que deseja ser o pai da cena.
In the scene <g1>Property Grid<\/g1> (on the right by default), next to <g2>Parent<\/g2>, specify the scene you want to be the scene's parent.
The <g1>default scene<\/g1> is the scene Stride loads at runtime.
O <g1>default cena<\/g1> é a cena Stride carrega no tempo de execução.
The <g1>default scene<\/g1> is the scene Stride loads at runtime.
You can set this in the <g2>Game Settings<\/g2> asset.
Você pode definir isso no ativo <g2>Game Settings<\/g2>.
You can set this in the <g2>Game Settings<\/g2> asset.
In the <g1>Solution Explorer<\/g1> (the bottom-left pane by default), select the <g2>Assets folder<\/g2>.
No <g1>Solution Explorer<\/g1> (o painel inferior esquerdo por padrão), selecione a pasta <g2>Assets<\/g2>.
In the <g1>Solution Explorer<\/g1> (the bottom-left pane by default), select the <g2>Assets folder<\/g2>.
In the <g1>Asset View<\/g1> (the bottom pane by default), select the <g2>GameSettings<\/g2> asset.
No <g1>Asset View<\/g1> (o painel inferior por padrão), selecione o ativo <g2>GameSettings<\/g2>.
In the <g1>Asset View<\/g1> (the bottom pane by default), select the <g2>GameSettings<\/g2> asset.
In the <g1>Property Grid<\/g1> (the right-hand pane by default), next to <g2>Default Scene<\/g2>, click <x1\/>Hand icon<x2\/> (<g3>Select an asset<\/g3>).
No <g1>Property Grid<\/g1> (o painel direito por padrão), ao lado de <g2>Default Scene<\/g2>, clique em <x1\/>Hand icon<x2\/> (<g3>Select an asset<\/g3>).
In the <g1>Property Grid<\/g1> (the right-hand pane by default), next to <g2>Default Scene<\/g2>, click <x1\/>Hand icon<x2\/> (<g3>Select an asset<\/g3>).
Select the default scene and click <g1>OK<\/g1>.
Selecione a cena padrão e clique em <g1>OK<\/g1>.
Select the default scene and click <g1>OK<\/g1>.
Stride loads this scene at runtime.
Stride carrega esta cena em tempo de execução.
Stride loads this scene at runtime.
For more information about the Game Settings asset, see <g1>Game Settings<\/g1>.
Para obter mais informações sobre o ativo Configurações de Jogo, consulte <g1>Configurações de Jogo<\/g1>.
For more information about the Game Settings asset, see <g1>Game Settings<\/g1>.
The <g1>active scene<\/g1> is the scene entities are added to when you drop them in the Scene Editor.
A cena <g1>active<\/g1> é que as entidades de cena são adicionadas quando você as deixa cair no Editor de cena.
The <g1>active scene<\/g1> is the scene entities are added to when you drop them in the Scene Editor.
Game Studio adds the entities as children to the active scene.
Game Studio adiciona as entidades como crianças à cena ativa.
Game Studio adds the entities as children to the active scene.
To set the active scene, <g1>Entity Tree<\/g1> (left by default), right-click the scene and select <g2>active scene<\/g2>.
Para definir a cena ativa, <g1>Entity Tree<\/g1> (esquerda por padrão), clique com o botão direito do mouse na cena e selecione <g2> cena ativa<\/g2>.
To set the active scene, <g1>Entity Tree<\/g1> (left by default), right-click the scene and select <g2>active scene<\/g2>.
The active scene has no effect on runtime.
A cena ativa não tem efeito no tempo de execução.
The active scene has no effect on runtime.
You can lock scenes and entities so they can't be selected in the main window.
Você pode bloquear cenas e entidades para que eles não possam ser selecionados na janela principal.
You can lock scenes and entities so they can't be selected in the main window.
This is useful when you have lots of things in your scene.
Isso é útil quando você tem muitas coisas em sua cena.
This is useful when you have lots of things in your scene.
You can still select scenes and entities in the Entity Tree.
Você ainda pode selecionar cenas e entidades na Entity Tree.
You can still select scenes and entities in the Entity Tree.
To lock or unlock a scene or entity, in the Entity Tree, click the <g1>padlock<\/g1> icon.
Para bloquear ou desbloquear uma cena ou entidade, na Árvore de Entidade, clique no ícone <g1>padlock<\/g1>.
To lock or unlock a scene or entity, in the Entity Tree, click the <g1>padlock<\/g1> icon.
When you lock a scene, all its child scenes and entities are locked too.
Quando você bloqueia uma cena, todas as cenas de crianças e entidades também estão bloqueadas.
When you lock a scene, all its child scenes and entities are locked too.
To lock an entity along with its child entities, hold <g1>Ctrl<\/g1> and click the padlock icon.
Para bloquear uma entidade junto com suas entidades de criança, segure <g1>Ctrl<\/g1> e clique no ícone do cadeado.
To lock an entity along with its child entities, hold <g1>Ctrl<\/g1> and click the padlock icon.
Locked items have a <g1>gold locked padlock<\/g1> icon in the Entity Tree.
Os itens bloqueados têm um ícone <g1> dourado bloqueado padlock<\/g1> na Árvore da Entidade.
Locked items have a <g1>gold locked padlock<\/g1> icon in the Entity Tree.
Load and unload scenes in the Scene Editor
Carregar e descarregar cenas no Editor de cenas
Load and unload scenes in the Scene Editor
You can load and unload scenes (with all their child scenes and entities) in the Scene Editor.
Você pode carregar e descarregar cenas (com todas as cenas e entidades de crianças) no Editor de cenas.
You can load and unload scenes (with all their child scenes and entities) in the Scene Editor.
Unloading scenes in the editor is useful if, for example, you want to remove clutter from your editing view, or improve editor performance.
Descarregamento de cenas no editor é útil se, por exemplo, você quiser remover a desordem da sua visualização de edição ou melhorar o desempenho do editor.
Unloading scenes in the editor is useful if, for example, you want to remove clutter from your editing view, or improve editor performance.
The screenshots below show a root scene with child scenes loaded and unloaded.
As capturas de tela abaixo mostram uma cena raiz com cenas de crianças carregadas e descarregadas.
The screenshots below show a root scene with child scenes loaded and unloaded.
The root scene contains entities that all the scenes use, including the <g1>skybox<\/g1>, <g2>scripts<\/g2>, asteroids, and player character.
A cena raiz contém entidades que todas as cenas usam, incluindo o <g1>skybox<\/g1>, <g2>scripts<\/g2>, asteroides e o personagem do jogador.
The root scene contains entities that all the scenes use, including the <g1>skybox<\/g1>, <g2>scripts<\/g2>, asteroids, and player character.
The child scenes are sections of level.
As cenas infantis são seções de nível.
The child scenes are sections of level.
To load or unload a scene, in the <g1>Scene Editor<\/g1>, in the <g2>Entity Tree<\/g2> on the left, next to the scene you want to load or unload, click the <g3>eye icon<\/g3>.
Para carregar ou descarregar uma cena, no <g1>Scene Editor<\/g1>, no <g2>Entity Tree<\/g2> à esquerda, ao lado da cena que pretende carregar ou descarregar, clique no ícone <g3>eye<\/g3>.
To load or unload a scene, in the <g1>Scene Editor<\/g1>, in the <g2>Entity Tree<\/g2> on the left, next to the scene you want to load or unload, click the <g3>eye icon<\/g3>.
As scenes aren't entities, they don't have transform components.
Como as cenas não são entidades, elas não têm componentes de transformação.
As scenes aren't entities, they don't have transform components.
However, you can move a scene using its <g1>offset<\/g1> property.
No entanto, você pode mover uma cena usando sua propriedade <g1>offset<\/g1>.
However, you can move a scene using its <g1>offset<\/g1> property.
To move a scene at runtime, use:
Para mover uma cena no tempo de execução, use:
To move a scene at runtime, use:
Replace <g1>myScene<\/g1> with the name of the scene, and <g2>x,y,z<\/g2> with the XYZ coordinates you want to move the scene to.
Substitua <g1>myScene<\/g1> com o nome da cena, e <g2>x,y,z<\/g2> com as coordenadas XYZ que você deseja mover a cena para.
Replace <g1>myScene<\/g1> with the name of the scene, and <g2>x,y,z<\/g2> with the XYZ coordinates you want to move the scene to.
